bisq.core.offer

Class OfferBookService

  • java.lang.Object
    • bisq.core.offer.OfferBookService

  • public class OfferBookService
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles storage and retrieval of offers. Uses an invalidation flag to only request the full offer map in case there was a change (anyone has added or removed an offer).
